title: If You Can't Sell It, TrySwappingIt.com

content: Very good idea. Swapping seems to be the in thing now days. How would one swap a home, the legal stuff and all?
reply: Very good idea. Swapping seems to be the in thing now days. How would one swap a home, the legal stuff and all?
title: If You Can't Sell It, TrySwappingIt.com

content: quote: Originally posted by crackerjacks61: Very good idea. Swapping seems to be the in thing now days. How would one swap a home, the legal stuff and all? Run through a realtor; they'll do it right, if duly experienced and licensed, etc. The right law office will usually handle it, too. The fees are not inconsequential, but from what I have seen, it might be a good deal for both parties in some cases.
quote: Originally posted by crackerjacks61: Very good idea. Swapping seems to be the in thing now days. How would one swap a home, the legal stuff and all?
